The claim misrepresents the availability: 2,400 a month from the government by implying that it is accessible to all Americans, when in reality, it is only available to unemployed individuals who qualify for federal unemployment assistance under the CARES Act.
The: 2,400 figure is derived by multiplying the $600 weekly benefit provided by the Federal Pandemic Unemployment Compensation program by four weeks in a month. However, it fails to mention that this program is set to expire at the end of July.
The Instagram post includes an image of: creating a misleading impression that individuals can easily access this additional monthly amount from the government.
